    APPEND_ITEM ENTRY_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM ENTRY 0 STRING "The entry passing the warning level"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"

        sprintf("Ping entry %s did not respond" , packet.read('entry') )

      META FORMAT_STRING "Ping entry %s did not respond"
      META ARGS entry
